name: Charged Up (iaminhere)
description:
Help your robot friend by picking up energy for him, but beware of activating traps that may make his path more difficult.

Made in a week for the Tri-Annual GJ. Theme was "You are your enemy."

Controls

  • A-D: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • F1: Full Screen
  • R: Restart Level

Art

  • Tiles:  0x72
  • Sound effects : BFXR (random sounds)
